Text.Page:
Unless you're blind, you see all the rotting corpses, skeletons, and...what is that? Something dead, I suppose.

Anyway, you're in the middle of our enemies, specifically the Raven Troops...Thulsa's largest battalion of all.

Wanna make the Raven Troops into Thulsa's second-largest battalion? Inflict some casualties, .

Wow, this is more than I expected. No wonder Krok recommended you so highly!

Kaia bless you, !

The Raven Troops are everywhere in this furnace.

Behead them all and prove your worth!
